select DOCID, CHANNELID, SITEID, DOCVERSION, DOCTYPE, DOCTITLE, DOCSECURITY, DOCSTATUS, DOCKIND, DOCABSTRACT, DOCKEYWORDS, DOCPEOPLE, DOCPLACE, DOCAUTHOR, DOCEDITOR, DOCAUDITOR, DOCOUTUPID, DOCVALIDTIME, DOCPUBURL, DOCPUBTIME, DOCRELTIME, CRUSER, CRUSERID, CRTIME, DOCWORDSCOUNT, RIGHTDEFINED, TITLECOLOR, TEMPLATEID, SCHEDULE, DOCFLAG, HITSCOUNT, SUBDOCTITLE, ATTACHED, DOCLINK, DOCFILENAME, OPERTIME, OPERUSER, FLOWOPERATIONMASKENUM, DOCSOURCENAME, PUBLISHDATE, LEADTITLE, REPLYFLAG, REPLYCOUNT, ISVALUE, TOPTOALL, SHOWTYPE, LASTMEMOID, LIFESTATUS, DOCLEVEL, PARENTPATH, MD5VALUE, RECOMMENDCOUNTS, DOCSCORE, ATTACHEDIXEXT, RESPERSON, ACTIVELEVEL, TRANSFORMNAME, PUBLISHSCOPE, METATABLEID, AUTHTYPE, ISDRAFT, KNOWLEDGEID, PUBLISHTIME, TRANSCOUNT, NOVALUE, COMPLETESCORE, CRYSCORE, ALLSCORE, FLOWPREOPERATIONMARK, COLLECTIONCOUNT, INFORMTYPE, AVGSCORE, MARKPERSONAMOUNT, GROUPID,URLADDRESS,DOCCONTENT, DOCHTMLCON, ATTACHEDCONTENT from irp_document
order by $orderByClause$

select DOCID, CHANNELID, SITEID, DOCVERSION, DOCTYPE, DOCTITLE, DOCSECURITY, DOCSTATUS, DOCKIND, DOCABSTRACT, DOCKEYWORDS, DOCPEOPLE, DOCPLACE, DOCAUTHOR, DOCEDITOR, DOCAUDITOR, DOCOUTUPID, DOCVALIDTIME, DOCPUBURL, DOCPUBTIME, DOCRELTIME, CRUSER, CRUSERID, CRTIME, DOCWORDSCOUNT, RIGHTDEFINED, TITLECOLOR, TEMPLATEID, SCHEDULE, DOCFLAG, HITSCOUNT, SUBDOCTITLE, ATTACHED, DOCLINK, DOCFILENAME, OPERTIME, OPERUSER, FLOWOPERATIONMASKENUM, DOCSOURCENAME, PUBLISHDATE, LEADTITLE, REPLYFLAG, REPLYCOUNT, ISVALUE, TOPTOALL, SHOWTYPE, LASTMEMOID, LIFESTATUS, DOCLEVEL, PARENTPATH, MD5VALUE, RECOMMENDCOUNTS, DOCSCORE, ATTACHEDIXEXT, RESPERSON, ACTIVELEVEL, TRANSFORMNAME, PUBLISHSCOPE, METATABLEID, AUTHTYPE, ISDRAFT, KNOWLEDGEID, PUBLISHTIME, TRANSCOUNT, NOVALUE, COMPLETESCORE, CRYSCORE, ALLSCORE, FLOWPREOPERATIONMARK, COLLECTIONCOUNT, INFORMTYPE, AVGSCORE, MARKPERSONAMOUNT, GROUPID,URLADDRESS from irp_document
order by $orderByClause$

select DOCID, CHANNELID, SITEID, DOCVERSION, DOCTYPE, DOCTITLE, DOCSECURITY, DOCSTATUS, DOCKIND, DOCABSTRACT, DOCKEYWORDS, DOCPEOPLE, DOCPLACE, DOCAUTHOR, DOCEDITOR, DOCAUDITOR, DOCOUTUPID, DOCVALIDTIME, DOCPUBURL, DOCPUBTIME, DOCRELTIME, CRUSER, CRUSERID, CRTIME, DOCWORDSCOUNT, RIGHTDEFINED, TITLECOLOR, TEMPLATEID, SCHEDULE, DOCFLAG, HITSCOUNT, SUBDOCTITLE, ATTACHED, DOCLINK, DOCFILENAME, OPERTIME, OPERUSER, FLOWOPERATIONMASKENUM, DOCSOURCENAME, PUBLISHDATE, LEADTITLE, REPLYFLAG, REPLYCOUNT, ISVALUE, TOPTOALL, SHOWTYPE, LASTMEMOID, LIFESTATUS, DOCLEVEL, PARENTPATH, MD5VALUE, RECOMMENDCOUNTS, DOCSCORE, ATTACHEDIXEXT, RESPERSON, ACTIVELEVEL, TRANSFORMNAME, PUBLISHSCOPE, METATABLEID, AUTHTYPE, ISDRAFT, KNOWLEDGEID, PUBLISHTIME, TRANSCOUNT, NOVALUE, COMPLETESCORE, CRYSCORE, ALLSCORE, FLOWPREOPERATIONMARK, COLLECTIONCOUNT, INFORMTYPE, AVGSCORE, MARKPERSONAMOUNT, GROUPID,URLADDRESS, DOCCONTENT, DOCHTMLCON, ATTACHEDCONTENT from irp_document where DOCID = #docid:DECIMAL#

sqlMap.update: update irp_document set docscore = (case when docscore is not null then docscore else 0 end)+#docscore:DECIMAL# where DOCID = #docid:DECIMAL#
